Detailed Description

BlockDiagram is a graphical view to a design.

QStringList BlockDiagram::instanceNames_ [private]

The map that contains the instance names for components.

Key = name of the component instance Value = the number of component instances with this name

This map is used to generate a running number for each component instance so all instance names are unique but may contain the component's VLNV name.

Definition at line 321 of file blockdiagram.h.

Referenced by createInstanceName(), mousePressEvent(), removeInstanceName(), setDesign(), and updateInstanceName().
